Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Wolfenstein : :

Wolf only stared at her for a moment in disbaliefe. Then is face showed the pain of loss before changing to rage.

Wolf let out a mighty roar as he punched the ground. he hit hard enough for his arm to be burried up to the elbow.

Wolf: I've now lost a brother and a friend in these damn Neo Beast Wars! When will the murdering ever stop?!

He began to cry. He wasn't acting like a Predacon but he didn't care.

> Between the aid of StarStorm and the work of internal repairs

>

>
